competition_summary.context: Competition, BGSS —In February 2023, the BPU announced that it would open a new docket to conduct a stakeholder proceeding regarding gas supply issues previously raised by competitive gas suppliers, including third-party suppliers’ participation in New Jersey gas distribution companies’ annual BGSS filings, and other aspects of the existing BGSS construct. In April-May 2023 the BPU Board conducted an initial stakeholder meeting and received written comments identifying any issues to be examined,
